final_answer.precision_note: 3 significant figures based on current and time inputs.

method: Calculate total charge Q = I * t = 1.50 A * (30.0 * 60 s) = 2700 C. Calculate moles of electrons n(e-) = Q / F = 2700 / 96500 = 0.02798 mol. From the stoichiometry Cu2+ + 2e- -> Cu, moles of Cu = n(e-) / 2 = 0.01399 mol. Mass of Cu = 0.01399 mol * 63.55 g/mol = 0.889 g.
checks: Mole ratio of electrons to copper is 2:1.
